start.title: Start for free
start.content: A digital platform allows Creators to make sustainable income.

comingSoon.message: Thank you for your interest! We'll keep you updated via email when we launch

finish.title: Successfully verified!
finish.content: Make your own mark by owning the Hub, customize the page interface in your style easily.

email.content1: Technology platform helps Creators do business and generate sustainable income
email.content2: To continue, confirm the email address you used to sign up for the account
email.enterCode: Enter the code that has been sent to your mail:

phone.enterCode: Enter the OTP that has been sent to your phone number:

phone.content2: Tạo mật khẩu cho tài khoản của bạn

login.welcome_: Mehub is the first integrated digital​ monetization platform supporting creators to create their brands, sell exclusive merch products, and take care of their fans in Vietnam.
login.title: Login
login.enterOtp: Enter the OTP that has been sent to your phone number:
login.loginError: Incorrect username or password, please try again!

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.content: Enter the email you used to reset your password.
forgotPassword.enterCodeEmail: Enter the code to reset the password that was sent to your email:
forgotPassword.enterCodePhone: Enter the code to reset the password that was sent to your phone number:
forgotPassword.content2: Create new password for your account
